resources.name: Colors
resources.description: Skinning your prototypes just got easier - colors.css is a collection of skin classes to use while prototyping in the browser.

resources.name: CSS triggers
resources.description: A list of css properties and whether or not they force a reflow.

resources.name: Flexbox in 5 minutes
resources.description: Take an interactive tour through all the major features of the new flexbox CSS property.

resources.name: Solved by flexbox
resources.description: This site is not another CSS framework. Instead, its purpose is to showcase problems once hard or impossible to solve with CSS alone, now made trivially easy with Flexbox.
